message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $100. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $100 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about $110?  This gives us both a good deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $105. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
